p: However, the change direction of B2-M and FGF 21 in the model plasma was opposite to that in the model perfusates (FigureÂ 5 and Additional file 2: Table S3): the relative abundance of these proteins was decreased in perfusates, whereas it was increased in plasma. It is likely that these proteins are not liver-specific proteins and can be secreted by other organs [ 26, 27], which may mask their decreased abundance in the liver. These results indicate that liver perfusate-based biomarker discovery should be limited to liver-specific proteins.
